title: Homeland Security tightens foreign worker authorizations after National Guardsman shooting
description: After DOT's efforts to shut down non-domiciled CDLs stalled, Homeland Security placed major new restrictions and fees on work-authorization applications.
content: After the Department of Transportation's efforts to end non-domiciled CDL issuance stalled out in court, the Department of Homeland Security announced major changes limiting work authorizations for f… [+3890 chars]
